name: bonnaroo-turns-10-2011-fest-to-be-held-june-9-12-black-friday-ticket-presale
title: Bonnaroo Turns 10: 2011 Fest To Be Held June 9-12, Black Friday Ticket Presale
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
And we have a date! Bonnaroo’s 10th birthday will be celebrated June 9-12, 2011, and it’s going to be huge! Or so we hear. Either way, Bonnaroo is always a big party, and we’re certain that it’ll be extra-fantastic for the big occasion. So mark those calendars, and feel free to start having sweet dreams of sweaty dance parties.

Eager earlybirds can grab presale tickets to Bonnaroo ’11 beginning November 26, aka the infamous Black Friday. As usual, presale tickets are on a tiered pricing system, so the earlier you snag ‘em, the cheaper they’ll be! Tickets go on sale at 11AM CT, and the price will start at $209.50 before increasing to $224.50 before running out and ruining your life, and/or the presale ends.
